content: this tiny turtle keychain requires no sewing or attaching you will begin at the top off the turtle s shell and will work to the bottom of the body all in one piece this pattern is available in english and in finnish materials sport weight yarn polyester fiber filling lobster claw clasp with keyring tapestry needle and scissors crochet hook size 2 5mm or 3mm usc/2 uk 11 or 12 the pattern is available for personal use only please do not distribute or reproduce the pattern or my photographs
